name: Eclosion
full_text: ENG: Pattern Description Eclosion is a relaxed and airy sweater, designed to be your ideal companion during those transitional days between seasons. Its look is both modern and timeless, thanks to its simple construction that showcases a textured yarn. The sweater features: A slightly oversized (loose) fit, offering maximum comfort and a flattering drape. Balloon-style sleeves with a detailed sleeve head and ribbed cuffs, creating a beautiful volume. A seed stitch (or garter stitch, depending on the appearance) on the body for a subtle texture and excellent definition of the speckled yarn. A simple round neckline, finished with ribbing. It’s perfect for showcasing speckled or multi-colored yarns! ENG: Model Description Éclosion is a casual and airy sweater, designed to be your ideal companion during transitional days between seasons. Its look is both modern and timeless, thanks to its simple construction showcasing a textured yarn. The sweater is characterized by: A slightly oversized (loose) cut, offering maximum comfort and a flattering fit. Balloon-style sleeves with a worked sleeve head and fitted ribbed cuffs, creating beautiful volume. A seed stitch (or garter stitch, depending on the look) on the body for subtle texture and excellent speckled yarn definition. A simple round neckline, finished in rib. It is perfect for highlighting speckled (speckled) or multi-colored wools!
